desc: When operating your restaurant tableside, you're going to be in need of a point-of-sale system that allows for built-in dining solutions to provide you and your customers an easy experience

items.title: Online Data Storage
items.description: Instead of being stored on a local computer or server, the point-of-sale systems process and store the data online, making it accessible from anywhere with internet connection.

items.title: Fast Processing
items.description: Allow for faster transactions with a wider range of payment options with a system that has been improved for increased speed and accuracy.

items.title: Keep Your Business Running
items.description: In the event of a crash or malfunction, you can easily retrieve your data due to a secure backup system and know that all your important business information is protected at all times.

items.title: No Shortages
items.description: Make sure to directly oversee your inventory & receive alerts when supplies are low so that you can avoid letting down customers due to shortages.

items.title: Focus on Customer Interaction
items.description: Created to assist you in minimizing the amount of time you spend facing the computer and maximizing the time you spend interacting with your customers.

items.title: Waste Nothing
items.description: Ensure that that the bar always has the necessary ingredients on hand and that no ingredients are going to waste.

items.title: Guest-Led Ordering
items.description: Use a mobile app that enables customers to browse menus, place orders for drinks, and make payments with no wait.

items.title: Keep it Going
items.description: With a bar POS system, pre-authorizing credit and debit cards simplifies operations and enhances the guest experience.

items.title: No restrictions, no requirements, no complications.
items.description: Allow your guests to split the bill as they wish: by guest, item, or a custom amount.

items.title: Tab Management
items.description: The POS system should be able to manage tabs efficiently, allowing customers to open and close tabs as needed and transfer them between servers or bartenders.

items.title: Drink Pricing and Menu Management
items.description: A bar or club POS system should be able to handle a wide range of drink pricing and menu options, including specials, discounts, and seasonal drinks.

items.title: Tip Management
items.description: The POS system should allow customers to add tips to their bills easily, with the option to leave a percentage or dollar amount.
